basics.summary: Designer and software developer with over 12 years of experience building 3 web browsers and hundreds of open source projects. Proven success creating custom solutions for a variety of businesses.

work.name: Mozilla
work.position: Android Developer Intern & Part-Time Student Worker

work.name: Google
work.position: Chrome for Android - Software Engineering Intern
highlights: Designed and built **JavaScript** internal tool to analyze millions of files. The tool was used to **save 30 KB** in the first week after release and avoid limits that would have halted Google Chrome for Android updates.
Performed user research to create design incorporating **Google Material Theme** with file exploration.
Implemented features focused **UX** and accessibility, including keyboard shortcuts and pie charts for folder sizes.

work.name: Vital Mechanics
highlights: Designed and developed **new user interface** for VitalFit Adobe Illustrator plugin using Blueprint.js and **React**.
**Produced brand materials** with **Adobe Illustrator** for VitalFit Windows installer.

work.name: Yelp
highlights: Led hackathon team to build new product for in-restaurant experience. Created presentation materials and **presented to the entire company**. Placed in **Top 3 of Hardcore** category out of 44 projects and was picked up by sales team afterwards.
Implemented UI for branching question flows with **React** following the Yelp design guidelines.

work.name: Centre for Sustainable Food Systems at UBC Farm
highlights: Designed and developed custom TypeScript software with the **UBC Work Learn International Undergraduate Research Award**.
Iterated designs with manager through **wireframes, prototypes**.

work.name: Oakes Management LLC
highlights: Designed and developed web portfolio to showcase residences.
Built design to take advantage of **GPU-accleration for a better user experience**.

projects.name: Pass the Bomb
highlights: **Selected by Microsoft as an outstanding project** in UBC Local Hack Day.
Created **animations** to delight users and **represent important game data**, such as time remaining and win/loss state.

projects.name: Big Island Buses
projects.description: Web app to replace Hawai'i paper bus schedules
highlights: Won **Grand Prize in Congressional App Challenge 2014, Hawaii’s 2nd District**.
Designed schedule displays inspired by **Material Design** and London Underground.
Contacted and worked with the **County of Hawai’i** to integrate the app with the island’s bus system.
Designed promotional posters and distributed to reach target audience.

projects.name: μzm
highlights: **Finalist, nwHacks 2018** out of 800+ people.
Designed **Android** app to scan NFC badges on exhibits and patrons.
Created sample data to present in application.

projects.name: Color Breakdown
projects.description: Design tool to analyze image color palette
highlights: Published **Progressive Web App** on **Microsoft Store**.
Designed interface to **emphasize important information** for users.

awards.title: UBC Work Learn International Undergraduate Reasearch Award
Grand Prize: Congressional App Challenge 2014, Hawaii’s 2nd Congressional District
